review: I am am blown away at how great this is. Seriously Schocked. Quick and easy, plug n' play. No delay in pix. Wow. Super easy remote. I download the app on my Droid. Not so great, the keyboard doesn't really work, but the voice search works great. Quite surprised at the additional apps ( free and no sign ups) that are included to watch old TV shows and didn't know PBS had an app! I can watch missed episodes from Masterpiece!It was either the Fire stick or a smart TV for my bedroom. We have a Smart TV in the living room (50" Samsung) but the smart part is crap. Thus stick blows it away. My buddy has the Chrome cast stick and loves it. I chose the Amazon stick because I am an Amazon Prime member and it had great reviews. I am glad it did!

review: There are many reviews on this so I won't bother.  If you have Amazon Prime, you might as well spend the small amount to purchase this.  The investment is minimal and you get a lot more for your money on Prime movies/show alone.  Plus, it has Netflix so you get the best of these two services.  As of Feb, 2015, I would like to see Sling TV and that will be my cord cutter moment.
